article_title: What Will Pharma Do When There Are No More Mega Mergers?

article_metadata.description: Mega-mergers have been a fact of life in the pharmaceutical industry for decades now, according to a McKinsey article by Myoung Cha and Theresa Loriman earlier this year, “Why pharma megamergers work.” Their report refutes a common belief that such mergers have destroyed value in the pharmaceutical industry.  Looking at the activity from [...]
article_metadata.author: Rawn Shah
